metadata.title: CVE-2021-37991 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Race in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 95.0.4638.54 allowed a remote attackerto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
